H0.text: Fruit, cricket and horseshoe are varieties of what type of animal. Mouse

H1.text: Fruit, cricket and horseshoe are varieties of what type of animal. Cat

H2.text: Fruit, cricket and horseshoe are varieties of what type of animal. Horse

H3.text: Fruit, cricket and horseshoe are varieties of what type of animal. Bat

A4.text: The slow-moving brown long-eared bat (Plecotus auritus) plucks insects from vegetation while many horseshoe bat species wait for them from their perches.

A5.text: The Jamaican fruit bat (Artibeus jamaicensis) has been recorded carrying fruit weighing as much as 50 g (1.8 oz).
